definition: to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
to pour/to deliberate
to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider
to measure one's words
discretionary power

sentences.english: They also take into consideration the difficulty of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 鏡頭的易度果豔也會斟酌在內。

sentences.english: A few sheepishly say they are just exploring their options.
sentences.chinese: 少數人會羞答答的說他們正在斟酌他們的選擇。

sentences.english: But to Zai Sheng Yuan's value localization in the literary history, resembles must further consider.
sentences.chinese: 但對《再生緣》的文學史價值定位，似需進一步斟酌。

sentences.english: Drinkin' white rum in a Portugal bar.
sentences.chinese: 在葡萄牙酒館把白朗姆酒斟酌。

sentences.english: His speech is slow and robotic, as if he is searching for every word.
sentences.chinese: 他說話語速很慢，語調機械，似乎每一個詞都要斟酌。

sentences.english: They are proactive and consider seriously the results they achieve.
sentences.chinese: 他們具有前瞻性，並且會仔細斟酌所得的成果。

sentences.english: We balanced all the probabilities of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我們對形勢的各種可能性加以比較與斟酌。

sentences.english: Life is too short for anyting else.
sentences.chinese: 生命太短暫，我們沒有時間去反覆地斟酌比對。

sentences.english: Simply take some part of the text that interest you and examine it carefully.
sentences.chinese: 只需抽出課文中你感興趣的某部分然後仔細斟酌。

sentences.english: And they will honor my request for discretion as well.
sentences.chinese: 而且他們還會尊重我對於斟酌處理權的要求。

sentences.english: After all those months of deliberation, was this prosaic utterance the pay-off?
sentences.chinese: 經過這麼多個月的斟酌，結果就是這些平淡的話語嗎？

sentences.english: On second thoughts, that introductory paragraph needs a little clarification.
sentences.chinese: 斟酌再三之後，本人有必要對上文段落作出小小澄清。

sentences.english: I've never wanted to think about the end, and then it was suddenly there.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒想要斟酌過已畢，而它就忽然離開你眼前。

sentences.english: The director deliberated for a long time before giving his decision.
sentences.chinese: 在做出決定之前，主任仔細斟酌了很久。

sentences.english: The Senate has been deliberating the question for three days.
sentences.chinese: 三天來參議院一直在仔細斟酌這個問題。

sentences.english: I modify the Sentences ahead several times just like weighing the feelings of mine.
sentences.chinese: 開頭的句子被我改了又改，像是斟酌自己的情感。
